name: LD52: Harvest Moonlet
description:
Harvest Moonlet

My game for Ludum Dare 52. Made from scratch in 48h.

Harvest Moonlet is a cozy farming simulator. Play as an alien controlling the rotation of a moon. Align the tomatoes to the position of the sun or a rain cloud to optimize the growing times and harvest a decent crop.

Controls:

  • LEFT: Increase moon rotation speed to the left
  • RIGHT: Increase moon rotation speed to the right
  • SPACE: Stop moon rotation
  • MOUSE: Control the moon rotation speed with the slider on the UFO

Source code: https://github.com/vnznznz/ld52

Tools: Godot 3.5, BoxySVG, jfxr

Ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/harvest-moonlet
